"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Adom nye asomdwee a ofir hɛn Egya Nyankopɔn nye Ewuradze Jesus Kraest nka hom."
"Nhyira nka hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest ne Nyankopɔn nye n’Egya a ɔyɛ ehumbɔbɔr Egya nye awerɛkyekyer nyina Nyankopɔn a"
"ɔkyekye hɛn werɛ wɔ hɛn ahohia nyina mu
nye onua Timoti: ama yeetum edua awerɛkyekyer a Nyankopɔn dze kyekye hɛn werɛ no do akyekye hɔn a wɔwɔ ahohia biara mu so werɛ."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na dɛ mbrɛ Kraest n’amandzehu kɛsenara ba hɛn do no
nye onua Timoti: dɛmara na hɛn awerɛkyekyer so nam Kraest mu bu do."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na sɛ wohiahia hɛn ho a
nye onua Timoti: ɔyɛ awerɛkyekyer na nkwagye ma hom; ɔno na ɔyɛ edwuma abotar mu wɔ amandze kor no ara a hɛn so yehu mu;"

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "na hɛn enyidado a ɔwɔ hom ho no tsim
nye onua Timoti: osiandɛ yenyim dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛ amandzehu no mu fafafo no
dze kɛma Nyankopɔn asɔr a ɔwɔ Korinte: mbrɛ hom yɛ awerɛkyekyer no mu bi so nye no."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na
dze kɛma Nyankopɔn asɔr a ɔwɔ Korinte: yɛmmpɛ dɛ yesiw hom hɛn ahohia a ɔbaa hɛn do wɔ Asia no do
nye ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Akaia nyina:": dɛ ɔhyɛɛ hɛn do mbordo traa hɛn ahoɔdzen
"#Ndwu 18.1": ma hɛn enyi fii hɛn nkwa do mpo:"

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "na hɛnankasa yɛtsee hɛn owu ne mfar wɔ hɛn mu
nye onua Timoti: amma yaammfa hɛn werɛ anntwer hɛnho
dze kɛma Nyankopɔn asɔr a ɔwɔ Korinte: na mbom yɛdze atwer Nyankopɔn a onyan ewufo no."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Ɔno na oyii hɛn fii dɛm owu kɛse yi mu
dze kɛma Nyankopɔn asɔr a ɔwɔ Korinte: na yɛwɔ enyidado dɛ ɔbɛda ho eyi hɛn;"

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "hom so dze hom nkotoserɛ roboa hɛn bi a
nye onua Timoti: ma akyɛdze a wɔnam dodow do dze ama hɛn no ntsi
dze kɛma Nyankopɔn asɔr a ɔwɔ Korinte: nyimpa pii aada ase ama hɛn."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na hɛn ahohyehyɛ nye yi
dze kɛma Nyankopɔn asɔr a ɔwɔ Korinte: dɛ Nyankopɔn krɔnkrɔnyɛ nye botooyɛ mu
column7: na yɛnam bɔɔ hɛn bra wɔ wiadze

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na yɛnnkyerɛw biribi mmbrɛ hom kyɛn dza hom kenkan na hom tse ase
nye onua Timoti: na m’enyi da do dɛ hom bɛtse ase dze ekesi ewiei;"

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "dɛ mbrɛ so hom tse hɛn ase fa na fa dɛ yɛyɛ hom ahohyehyɛ
nye onua Timoti: dɛ mbrɛ hom so yɛ hɛndze wɔ hɛn Ewuradze Jesus da no mu."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na dɛm awerɛhyɛmu yi mu na mepɛɛ dɛ nkyɛ mebɛba hom nkyɛn ana
"#Ndwu 18.1": na mefi Masidonia aba hom nkyɛn bio
column7: na hom eegya me kwan ma maakɔ Judea."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Dɛm ntsi mobɔɔ me tsirmu dɛm no
nye onua Timoti: midzii adwenharsɛm anaa? Anaa me tsirmu a mobɔ no
dze kɛma Nyankopɔn asɔr a ɔwɔ Korinte: mobɔ no honam mu na m’asɛm kor no ara ayɛ nyew

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na dɛ mbrɛ Nyankopɔn yɛ nokwafo no
nye onua Timoti: hɛn asɛm a yɛka kyerɛ hom nnyɛ nyew nye oho."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na Nyankopɔn ba Jesus Kraest a yɛbɛkaa no ho asɛm wɔ hom mu no
nye ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Akaia nyina:": na no mu mbom na nyew no wɔ."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na Nyankopɔn abɔ anohoba dodow dɛn ara a
dze kɛma Nyankopɔn asɔr a ɔwɔ Korinte: na iyi ntsi na no mu na Amen wɔ
nye ahotseweefo a wɔwɔ Akaia nyina:": ma wɔnam hɛn do hyɛ Nyankopɔn enyimnyam."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na nyia oetsim hɛn nye hom wɔ Kraest mu
"ɔno so na ɔasɔw hɛn ano
nye onua Timoti: na ɔama hɛn Sunsum no ne nsewhyɛ wɔ hɛn akoma mu."

"Paul a ɔnam Nyankopɔn pɛ do yɛ Kraest: "Na mefrɛ Nyankopɔn dɛ ombedzi me kra dase dɛ memmpɛ dɛ mohow hom werɛ ntsi na mammba Korinte bio no."
"Nnyɛ dɛ yɛyɛ hom gyedzi do ahyɛdofo
nye onua Timoti: na mbom yɛyɛ hom enyigye aboafo: osiandɛ gyedzi na hom dze tsim."
